tool_description: Service provides API for making Sudoku games development easier.
name: Sudoku Suite
title: Sudoku Suite

api_list.name: /levels
api_list.description: List levels of difficulty for creating a new puzzle. The level is higher there is more empty cells in a grid.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sudoku-suite.p.rapidapi.com/levels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sudoku-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /game/{gameId}/solution
api_list.description: Returns solved grid of a specific game

required_parameters.name: gameId
required_parameters.description: ID of a game to return

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sudoku-suite.p.rapidapi.com/game/9346ecf2-d8cd-4cbd-98a4-d0d64e5bfdd8/solution"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sudoku-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /game/{gameId}
api_list.description: Returns game information that includes an initial puzzle, solved state and a list of steps to solve the puzzle.

required_parameters.name: gameId
required_parameters.description: ID of a game to return

import requests

url = "https://sudoku-suite.p.rapidapi.com/game/{gameid}"
